title: (x) "Letters From Iwo Jima" movie logo - Trajan {Dan R, Mili Carr}
content:
Hello, can anyone ID the large title font used on this poster?

Link: [http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/2015/lettersfromiwojimaver8zb9.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110501132250/http:/img338.imageshack.us/img338/2015/lettersfromiwojimaver8zb9.jpg "http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/2015/lettersfromiwojimaver8zb9.jpg")

Thanks a lot.
author: Ingonyama

comments.content:
Trajan

Oh, Dan got there first!

If it is from Hollywood, it must be Trajan--even though it makes no sense with the subject :-)

ChrisL

For any questins about type on movie posters you can always check my [Unzipped](http://web.archive.org/web/20110501132250/http:/www.fontshop.be/) blog. It's searchable, so just type in the movie title and it will return whatever you're looking for. The blog is in Dutch, but that makes no difference for typeface names. ;^)

Yves, I'll bet that was an easy thing to program, no matter what Hollywould film they type in, the responswe is always Trajan :-)

ChrisL
